sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
paragraphs: By accessing and using LootQuest, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations.
If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.

sections.title: 2. User Eligibility
paragraphs: You must be at least 13 years old to use LootQuest.
Users between 13-18 must have parental consent.
By registering, you confirm that all information provided is accurate and truthful.

sections.title: 3. Account Security
paragraphs: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
Never share your password or login information with anyone.
Report any unauthorized access to your account immediately.

sections.title: 4. Earning Points
paragraphs: Points are earned by completing offers through our partner networks.
Attempting to earn points through fraudulent means will result in account termination.
‚ö†Ô∏è WARNING: Using VPNs, bots, or automated tools is strictly prohibited and will result in permanent ban.

sections.title: 5. Withdrawal Policy
paragraphs: First-time withdrawals require a 7-day account age minimum.
Withdrawals are processed within 24-72 hours.
All withdrawal requests are final and cannot be reversed.
‚ö†Ô∏è WARNING: Fraudulent activity will result in forfeiture of all points and permanent account ban.

sections.title: 6. Prohibited Activities
paragraphs: Creating multiple accounts is strictly prohibited.
Using VPNs, proxies, or any IP masking technology is not allowed.
Attempting to manipulate or exploit offers or the points system.
Sharing accounts or transferring points between accounts.
Any form of automated activity including bots, scripts, or macros.

sections.title: 7. Termination
paragraphs: We reserve the right to terminate any account that violates these terms.
Terminated accounts forfeit all accumulated points.
Decisions regarding account termination are final.

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
paragraphs: Email address and account credentials
IP address and device information
Activity data including offers completed and points earned
Payment information for withdrawal processing

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
paragraphs: To provide and maintain our service
To process withdrawals and verify transactions
To detect and prevent fraud
To communicate important updates about your account

sections.title: 3. Data Sharing
paragraphs: We share necessary data with offer partners to verify offer completion.
Payment processors receive information required to process withdrawals.
We may disclose information if required by law or to protect our rights.

sections.title: 4. Data Security
paragraphs: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data.
All sensitive information is encrypted in transit and at rest.
We regularly audit our security practices.

sections.title: 5. Your Rights
paragraphs: You may request access to your personal data at any time.
You may request deletion of your account and associated data.
Contact support@lootquest.com for any privacy-related inquiries.

sections.title: 1. What Are Cookies
paragraphs: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website.
They help us provide a better user experience and understand how you use our service.

sections.title: 2. Types of Cookies We Use
paragraphs: Essential Cookies: Required for the website to function properly (authentication, security).
Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.
Third-Party Cookies: Set by our offer partners to track offer completions.

sections.title: 3. Managing Cookies
paragraphs: You can control cookies through your browser settings.
Disabling essential cookies may affect website functionality.
Third-party cookies from offer partners are required to verify offer completions.

sections.title: 4. Third-Party Services
paragraphs: We use services like Lootably which may set their own cookies.
These services have their own privacy policies governing cookie usage.
We recommend reviewing the privacy policies of our partner services.

sections.title: üéÆ Getting Started
paragraphs: Q: How do I earn points on LootQuest?
A: Complete offers from our partners, watch videos, take surveys, and participate in daily challenges. Each activity rewards you with points that can be exchanged for rewards.
Q: Is LootQuest free to use?
A: Yes! LootQuest is completely free. You earn points by completing offers and can redeem them for real rewards.

sections.title: üí∞ Points & Earnings
paragraphs: Q: How much are points worth?
A: 1,000 points = $1.00 in reward value. So if a reward costs 5,000 points, it's equivalent to a $5 value.
Q: Why didn't I receive my points?
A: Points may take up to 24 hours to credit. Ensure you fully completed the offer requirements. Using VPNs or ad blockers can prevent points from being credited.
Q: How long do offers take to credit?
A: Most offers credit within 24-48 hours. Some may take up to 7 days depending on the partner network.

sections.title: üéÅ Withdrawals & Rewards
paragraphs: Q: When can I make my first withdrawal?
A: Your account must be at least 7 days old before your first withdrawal. This helps us prevent fraud.
Q: How long do withdrawals take?
A: Withdrawals are typically processed within 24-72 hours. Digital rewards (Robux, V-Bucks) may be instant.
Q: What rewards are available?
A: We offer Robux, V-Bucks, Steam Wallet, PlayStation Store, Amazon gift cards, and PayPal cash.

sections.title: üîí Account & Security
paragraphs: Q: Can I have multiple accounts?
A: No. Creating multiple accounts is strictly prohibited and will result in all accounts being banned.
Q: Can I use a VPN?
A: No. VPNs, proxies, and IP masking tools are not allowed. Using them will result in account termination.
Q: What happens if my account is suspended?
A: If you believe your account was wrongly suspended, contact our support team. All accumulated points are forfeited upon termination for fraud.

sections.title: ‚ùì Technical Issues
paragraphs: Q: The offer wall isn't loading. What do I do?
A: Try disabling your ad blocker, clearing your browser cache, or using a different browser.
Q: I completed an offer but it's not showing as complete.
A: Wait 24 hours for the offer to process. If it still doesn't credit, report it using our bug report form.
Q: How do I contact support?
A: Use the 'Contact Us' form in our footer, or join our Discord community for faster assistance.
